content:
Hello all,
What is the best way to represent estimatedCarbs, mealtype , mealComposition , carbsComplexity in observation resource ? Does anyone have advice on this subject? Any best practices or fhir bundle samples out there?

estimatedCarbs - 100 gram

"mealType"

  • Breakfast
  • Lunch
  • Dinner
  • Snack
  • Beverage"

"mealComposition"

  • Low carb meal
  • Balanced carb meal
  • High carb meal

"carbsComplexity"

  • Simple Carbs
  • Complex Carbs"

Thanks
Did you look at nutritionProduct / nutritionintake resources?
Hi @Jose Costa Teixeira sorry forgot to mention that it is for STU3.
